parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To forget, neglect. Middle voice from epi and lanthano; to lose out of mind; by implication, to neglect.
(a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.
Bread, a loaf, food. From airo; bread or a loaf.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
Bread, a loaf, food. From airo; bread or a loaf.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural

str2: In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A ship, vessel, boat. From pleo; a sailer, i.e. Vessel.
